meanings.definition: Blooming more than once in a season.
meanings.sent1: The remontants roses in our garden bloom multiple times each year.
meanings.sent2: I love how these remontants flowers keep blooming throughout the season.
meanings.sent3: The remontants daisies seem to enjoy showing off their multiple blooms.
meanings.sent4: Her personality is like remontants flowers, always brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The remontants cherry tree paints the garden with bursts of color at different times.

meanings.definition: A plant that blooms more than once in a season.
meanings.sent1: We have a variety of remontants in our garden, ensuring continuous blooms.
meanings.sent2: The remontants in the greenhouse are carefully tended to for their multiple blooms.
meanings.sent3: The remontants in the flower bed seem to be in a competition to bloom the most.
meanings.sent4: The garden is a canvas of colors with the remontants plants blooming at different times.
meanings.sent5: Visitors are always amazed by the beauty of our remontants garden, full of blooming plants.
